title: Daylight 2014 Steam-Rip MULTi6-RG GameWorks
description:
::::::::: GAMEWORKS PRESENTS :::::::::


:::: Daylight 2014 Steam-Rip MULTi6-RG GameWorks ::::


::Information::


Released : April 29, 2014
Genre: Horror
Developer: Zombie Studios
Publisher: Zombie Studios
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English / French / German / Italian / Spanish / Japanese
Language: English / French / German / Italian / Spanish / Japanese
Tablet: Present ( Deadmau5 / SKiDROW emu. )


::Description::


Daylight - horror, built on the Unreal Engine 4. There we will play for a woman 
who woke up in a strange dark building stranded shelter for the mentally ill.
Players will explore the mental hospital premises, using only the light of a 
torch smartphone, and each room is generated dynamically.


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 
Processor: 2.3+ GHz 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11 
DirectX: Version 11 
Hard Drive: 5 GB available space 
Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater; Intel 4000 
or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates 
to your video and sound card drivers may be required.


::Installation Steps::


1) Install by running setup.exe

2) Copy the contents of the folder NoDVD in the main game directory.

3) Play
